bibl.title: Provisioning the Desert: Pottery Supply to Mons Claudianus.

bibl.note: The site and its environs. - Imported amphorae at Mons Claudianus. - Mons Claudianus in its wider context.
TOMBER Roberta S., Provisioning the Desert: Pottery Supply to Mons Claudianus.
